title: Child draw nearer
creator_credit: Martin Shuttleworth, Annie Mygind and Bristol Films
brief_description: This film shows the advances made at a special school for teaching autistic children and how they began to respond to patience and to use language in a normal way. Commentary by Norman Tyrrell and Val Bryan.
creator_credit_for_label: Martin Shuttleworth, Annie Mygind and Bristol Films
